attributes.action: Stop the installation of energy key meters  and stop disconnections for 1year
attributes.additional_details: The energy crisis isn't going to end anytime soon. 70%of the world's energy is consumed by the wealthiest 10%. The first law of thermodynamics means there is no quick fix, this means  low income families will struggle.  By ensuring a continued supply of energy through stopping disconnections lives can be saved
attributes.background: Stop energy companies installing key meters for those that are in energy arrears and stop disconnections for at least 1 year

rejection.details:
We currently have the below petition open which you might like to sign:

Ban the use of prepayment meters for energy provision.
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/607746
